root: ^Ello’ Stranger, Odd to see wanderers’ about these parts”
^Do you see anyone about these parts?

Parts: ^No, actually, you’re the first in months.
John: ^Beggin’ your Pardon John but you are mighty strange.
Drink: ^Unfortunately the taps have been dry for a season, I can offer you some assorted wares though.
Items: ^I should charge for these but I’ve no use for coin in these parts.
^No beer and no money, Where the hell am I?
Where: ^One of them for sure. Not sure which one. Now beat it stranger.
Junk: ^I can! And I will next time! Now scoot!
GoNext: ^Out of my Tavern would be a good start.
